message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for a limited time at the special price of $120. I think you'll find it's a great deal!
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I was hoping to find a price closer to my budget. Would you consider selling the product for $95?
Hi Bob, thanks for your offer. I understand your budget concerns, but $120 is already a very competitive price for this item. Could you meet me halfway at $107.50?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. While I understand the value of the item, I would like to propose a price of $100 if possible.
